snippet: The Orchestra of St. Luke’s performed works by Tchaikovsky, Mendelssohn and others — all of them pieces inspired by poetry and drama — at Carnegie Hall.
abstract: Corinna da Fonseca-Wollheim reviews performance by Orchestra of St Luke's at Carnegie Hall.
lead_paragraph: The Orchestra of St. Luke’s performed works by Tchaikovsky, Mendelssohn and others — all of them pieces inspired by poetry and drama — at Carnegie Hall.

headline.seo: Orchestra of St. Luke’s Gives a Literature-Inspired Concert
